name: Whitescape
tagline: Hi-level rock-solid and well managed team
description:
Whitescape is a well-staffed development team with 150 accomplished projects and counting. We have also rolled out two successful in-house startups — Riders (500K users) and Uploadcare (200M files).
No matter the size or the current stage of your project, we offer unique solutions, strict terms of execution, and the best expertise.
We are proud of our management process, tracking implementation of your ideas from prototype to launch.
Since Whitescape's inception in 2008, our team has grown to 17 experts but has remained stable over the past six years — we prioritize quality over quantity, so we hire only those who bring fresh and innovative experiences to the table.
That's how we deliver.
READ MORE...
